name: Blue vs Red (Last Angle Studio)
description:
This game was created by me (Heather) and my brother (Iestyn). A while ago Iestyn came up with the idea for this game, and thought out all the fighters and their stats on paper. After playing it a couple of times, he asked if I could make a game out of it. At the time I had only just completed my first game, but I wanted to give it a go. After some breaks due to other projects, the game was mainly finished and Iestyn started on the music and sound effects. 

And now it's done, our first game as a team!

We hope you enjoy it.
